Ok this is for anyone with an ATI graphics card with dark screen dark characters. Ultimate fix >

select  then set everything to default.
after that:

-Enable triple buffering

How to Install: For Noobs

1. Unrar.

   This means the is a zip file in this download. 
   You can open this file with winzip, winrar, or 7-zip.
   Within this zip file there is usually an .iso file.
   Extract it to someplace you can easily remember.

2. Burn or mount the image.

   The "image" is this .iso file.
   You have 2 choices here.

   1) Burn, this is burning it to a disk using any CD burning program.
      (Nero and Roxio are popular burning programs.)

   2) Mount, this is using a program to create a virtual disk drive on your computer.
      Once the virtual drive is created, you "mount" the "image" a.k.a. "load" the "file" 
      onto this virtual drive.
      (Popular programs include Daemon Tools and Alcohol Soft.)

3. Install the game.

   Now you can install the game.
   You either load it from the disk you burnt, or load it from your 
   virtual drive after the "image" is "mounted".
   (Installs just like any other game.)

4. Copy over the cracked content.

   CD or mounted image, you can explore the files in/on the .iso file a.k.a. the disk.
   Once file explorer is open and you are viewing the contents of the disk,
   look for a folder labeled "Crack(s)". Copy the contents of this folder to replace the
   files in the installed folder.
   (These will usually be .exe and .dll files, maybe more.)

5. Play the game.

   You may now begin playing the game.
   Make sure you have replaced the .exe that came with the install, 
   with the one that comes in the "Cracked" folder.
   Otherwise the game may ask for a disk.

@trueAustinLove, turn off Vsync in your ATI or NVIDIA control panel. It is a known issue that when Vsync is turned on with this game all the cut scenes stutter and will not run smoothly. When it is turned off it will run fine but then you face the problem of horizontal tearing on the monitor. This game needs a patch asap.

If this dosen't help then click on the link below as it has more solutions:

http://www.gamebrood.com/2010/10/28/star-wars-the-force-unleashed-2-pc-fix-and-fixes-for-crashes-errors-black-screen-issues-freezes-graphics-glitch-level-bug-controls-not-responding-no-sound-low-performance-choppy-and-stutteri/
This upload is fine thanks, but this game? It sucks! Seen and played it all before. Im over it already

#### CONFIRMED: ####

Disabling "Vertical Sync" ("vsync") in your Nvidia or ATI control panel will FIX THE LAG ISSUE.

At first i was like "What? What the hell am im doing here?!" but then i realised it had skipped a level,

***SALVATION'S BRIDGE BUG***

To all the people who didn't bother reading any of the comments before complaining, i posted a somewhat "fix" for the Salvation's Bridge bug.

To clarify, the bug in question is the level where you need to remove the powercell from the cannon, and place it into the broken cannon to shoot the door out. The bug prevents the power cell from being removed... at all.

TO FIX THIS... you need to restart the level from a PREVIOUS save game. don't just replay the level, because the bug will still be there. You NEED to load a new save... even if it means repeating the entire level or the level before. Restarting from another save *should* fix the bug itself.

Hope that helps.

How to install.
1. Download and open with WinRar or 7zip.
2. Extact the ISO file on desktop (or somewhere else).
3. Mount or Burn the ISO file with PowerISO or Deamon Tools.
4. Go to Computer and click on the CD-Unit (SWTFU2).
5. Install.
6. Right click the CD-Unit and explore it and find "Crack" and copy the SWTFU2.
7. Go to "Program Files (x86) -> Lucas Arts -> Replace SWTFU2 with the copied one.
8. Start SWTFU and then PLAY!
Hope it helps!

FOR ANYONE TRYING TO REINSTALL READ BELOW!!!

Needed to catch your eyes.

64 bit computers: Search REGEDIT in the search option and run it as ADMIN.  Then goto HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\LucasArts\Star Wars The Force Unleashed 2 and delete the entire folder.  All done, install the force unleashed 2. :)

32 bit computers do the same but goto HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\LucasArts\Star Wars The Force Unleashed 2 and delete the entire folder.

ALL DONE. You may now reinstall The Force Unleashed 2.  Your welcome.

TyMoD.

PATCH INSTALL!

Also if you are trying to patch it then you must download the European version NOT THE USA/AMERICAN VERSION.

ALL THE INFO YOU WILL NEED TO ENJOY THIS GAME!

IF YOU CAN'T UNINSTALL...

1. Go to Task Manager
2. Find Process 'hkcmd.exe'
3. Kill process
4. Go to %Program Files%\Lucas Arts\Star Wars: The Force Unleashed 2
5. Run uninstall.exe
6. Enjoy the extra hard drive space
